info.title: vbout
info.description: Vbout API provides programmatic access to read and write Vbout data. You can use it to synch user information between your own database and Vbout's marketing automation, get prospects information and more.

commission_structure.description:
The commission structure.

Possible Values: (1: Discount to paid amount) | (2: Normal commission payout)

pay_on_signup.description: Pay using agency saved card on success signup, and save the card to the newly created account.

get.description: It should work with with Agencies only

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the sub-account.

parameters.name: expire
parameters.description: The number of seconds that the returned auto-login url will remain valid before it expire (MAX 3600 Seconds).

parameters.name: channels
parameters.description: The channels from where the posts are gathered.

Time of the post to be scheduled.

permissions.description:
The permissions of the user. (comma-separated values)

optional
required if no group is selected
